title: OCE OPEN LADDER TEAM RECRUITMENT
body:
Looking for some players to fill my OOL team!

We need a Top and Support

Only conditions are that you're Plat or above (last season end or right now) and being friendly while in Voice Com

Please either add me in game (StellarUmbra) or comment here!

replies.body:
Not sure if you'd like a gold, but here is my two cents if you would consider.

Gold last season, back in gold again this season.
Top main with Marksman as my side dish.

Currently play Nasus in solo queue, i know all his matchups and is by far my greatest asset. Will be learning matchups for other champions this season as dynamic queue has kinda stuffed my nasus up.

Cheers!
Andrew.
Soz buddy we're full now. But r u the real {{champion:75}}  sirhcez? {{champion:75}}
add me i can support, im plat 3
